summary: Encapsulates the outputs of a vision transformer model, including the sequence of hidden states from the final layer, optional hidden states from all layers, and optional image embeddings produced by a projection of the pooled output.
business_intent: Standardizes the representation of vision model results so that downstream components (e.g., classifiers, retrieval systems, multimodal aligners) can reliably access the necessary tensors without handling raw model internals.
